description:
[https://docs.sentry.io/api/events/remove-an-issue/](https://docs.sentry.io/api/events/remove-an-issue/)

Removes an individual issue.

### Path Parameters

`issue_id` *(string)*REQUIRED

The ID of the issue to delete.

### Scopes

You need to [authenticate via bearer auth token.](https://docs.sentry.io/api/auth) requires one of the following scopes:

*   `event:admin`
